channel.title: JAVA Problem
channel.description:
Hello people, im experiencing java problems, i get various errors when i try to load java applets e.g. runescape, its fine using mopar or aryan but i cant load it via a browser. i have read various tutorials etc on how to fix the problem but still no luck. Here is the error i get in the Java Sun console if anybody can make sense of it?;
java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.match(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.getMatchingFile(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader$4.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader.getCacheFile(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader.(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.get(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.net.protocol.jar.CachedJarURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.net.protocol.jar.CachedJarURLConnection.getJarFile(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$JarLoader.getJarFile(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$JarLoader.(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getResource(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at sun.plugin.cache.Cache.createTable(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.FileCache$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.plugin.cache.FileCache.(Unknown Source) ... 29 more
Anybody know whats going wrong? id greatly appreciate any feedback & help. THanx very much -Bax EDIT- I have just tried loading it with an unsigned applet and it seems to be loading, but i have tried this countless times before with no sign of working. So this is kinda odd, wonder whats the problem.

item.title: JAVA Problem
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Reinstall java/make sure your paths are set right. If you have the files and your computer knows where they are, and it’s still not working, it’s a personal problem.

Read full topic

item.title: JAVA Problem
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

kuiren2:

update your java? maybe thats it

It could be an old source.

That exception(s) basically says you’re missing a ton of shit.

Read full topic

item.title: JAVA Problem
item.dc:creator: @baxter190388 baxter190388
item.description:
@baxter190388 wrote:

Hello people, im experiencing java problems, i get various errors when i try to load java applets e.g. runescape, its fine using mopar or aryan but i cant load it via a browser. i have read various tutorials etc on how to fix the problem but still no luck. Here is the error i get in the Java Sun console if anybody can make sense of it?;

java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.match(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.getMatchingFile(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader$4.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader.getCacheFile(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.CachedJarLoader.(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.JarCache.get(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.net.protocol.jar.CachedJarURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.net.protocol.jar.CachedJarURLConnection.getJarFile(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$JarLoader.getJarFile(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$JarLoader.(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath$3.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.URLClassPath.getResource(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.AppletViewer.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.runLoader(Unknown Source) at sun.applet.AppletPanel.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException at sun.plugin.cache.Cache.createTable(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin.cache.FileCache$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at sun.plugin.cache.FileCache.(Unknown Source) ... 29 more

Anybody know whats going wrong? id greatly appreciate any feedback & help. THanx very much -Bax

EDIT- I have just tried loading it with an unsigned applet and it seems to be loading, but i have tried this countless times before with no sign of working. So this is kinda odd, wonder whats the problem.

Read full topic
